sense.def:
Z izrazom
their
povemo, da nekaj pripada osebam ali stvarem ali je povezano z osebami ali stvarmi, ki smo jih pravkar omenili ali katerih identiteto poznamo.

seg.quote: Don't hope to change anyone or their attitudes.

sense.def:
Izraz
their
uporabljamo tudi pred aristokratskimi nazivi v množini.

seg.quote: Their Lordships were already late for dinner.
